xarray_to_xdataset¶

Converts an Xarray DataArray to a Xarray Dataset

Parameters

  • band_names (list) –

  • time_names (list) –

  • ycoords (1d array-like) –

  • xcoords (1d array-like) –

  • attrs (dict) –
